battle.no-mana: You try to use **{{name}}**, but dont have mana! The enemy retaliate!
battle.attack: You attack **{{enemy}}** with **{{choice}}**, and deal **{{damage}}** damage
battle.footer: Type in the chat option of your choice
battle.new-tatic: You tried a new technique, but were unsuccessful! The enemy attacks
battle.timeout: You took too long to take action, and you were attacked!
battle.text:
**{{enemy}}** attacks you with **{{attack}}**, and deals you **{{dmg}}**, updating your status:

**YOUR STATUS**
‚ù§Ô∏è | Life: **{{life}}**
üíß | Mana: **{{mana}}**
‚öîÔ∏è | Damage: **{{damage}}**
üõ°Ô∏è | Armor: **{{armor}}**

**ENEMY'S STATUS**
‚ù§Ô∏è | Life: **{{elife}}**
‚öîÔ∏è | Damage: **{{edmg}}**
üõ°Ô∏è | Armor: **{{earmor}}**

What do you do?

**OPTIONS:**

death: Oww nooo, you died! To recover from the damage, you have returned to the guild, and will rest for 12 hours!
new-ability: You have reached the level **{{level}}** and unlocked a new skill! **{{ability}}**
family: You have unlocked families! Use `m! Family` to join a family
boss:
you reach level 20, and become a dungeon MASTER! 
From now on, you can use the m!boss command to battle bosses whenever you want

initial.in-battle-text: You are already in the middle of a battle!
initial.no-life-text: You are lifeless, and need to rest for more **{{time}}** hours
initial.tired-text: You have already visited the dungeon and need to rest for more **{{time}}**
initial.hotel-text: You are resting at the village hotel, and you cannot go to the dungeon until your stay is over, in **{{time}}**
initial.cant-go: You cannot visit the dungeon for the following reasons:

scape: you got out of the battle, and managed to escape, but you will have to rest for 2 hours!
registred: you have been successfully registered! Use `m!status` to see your status
backpack-full: you get a loot, but your backpack is full, and you need to let them down
evolve: you reach your proficiency level, and become a **{{class}}**
